short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes the color theme on ChatGPT's website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
=============== LAST UPDATE ===============
Due to ChatGPT's last interface update, the extension didn't work anymore in some areas of the website. Now that's fixed!

Complete overhaul of the extension's interface. Now it looks sooooo much better!

The colors of the color themes were updated, now they look nicer!

Now the page reloads automatically when a theme is applied!

The extension wasn't working properly if the user used ChatGPT in Light Mode. Now that's also fixed.

=============== TRY IT NOW ===============
‚úÖDownload ColorfulGPT on your browser
üåêGo to ChatGPT official website
üîçOpen the extension by clicking on its icon in the extensions tab
üéØSelect any of the themes available!
